titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Colchester, June 2. 1697. Before the Right Honourable and Reverend Father in God Henry Lord Bishop of London, at a conference with his clergy upon His Majesty's late injunctions. / By H. De Luzancy ... ; Printed by his Lordship's special command. ; To which are prefixed some remarks on the Socinians late answer to the four letters written against them by the same author.
titleStmt.author: De Luzancy, H. C. (Hippolyte du Chastelet), d. 1713.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Colchester, June 2. 1697. Before the Right Honourable and Reverend Father in God Henry Lord Bishop of London, at a conference with his clergy upon His Majesty's late injunctions. / By H. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Holt for Tho. Bennet, at the Half Moon in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
